item.title: Stop Being Unkind To Yourself – Dev Leader Weekly 47
item.description: The post Stop Being Unkind To Yourself – Dev Leader Weekly 47 appeared first on Dev Leader.Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss why it's important to be kind to yourself as a software engineer looking to improve. The post Stop Being Unkind To Yourself – Dev Leader Weekly 47 appeared first on Dev Leader. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2024/06/08/stop-being-unkind-to-yourself-dev-leader-weekly-47/
